PHRASE.LANG: A man doesn't need this to get service, but it goes well with the rest of the outfit; so why not? It can't hurt. [#Legal]
Un homme n'a pas vraiment besoin de ça. mais avouez que c'est la classe ! Alors pourquoi s'en priver ? [#Legal]
Das braucht ein Mann nicht, um Respekt zu bekommen, aber es passt so gut zum Rest, also warum nicht? [#Legal]
Beh, questo forse non è proprio indispensabile, ma sta benissimo con il resto del completo, quindi, perché no? [#Legal]
Un hombre no necesita esto para llamar la atención, pero no desentona con el resto del atuendo, así que ¿por qué no? No le hará daño a nadie. [#Legal]
お洒落なアクセサリーがあると損ではないし [#Legal]
이건 없어도 술집에 들어갈 수 있다. 그렇지만 다른 복장과 잘 어울리니 있어도 나쁠 건 없겠지? [#Legal]
A man doesn't need this to get service, but it goes well with the rest of the outfit; so why not? It can't hurt. [#Legal]
男子漢不需要這以獲得服務，但這能讓裝備更加齊全，因此何樂不為？且不會損傷。[#Legal]
男子漢不需要這以獲得服務，但這能讓裝備更加齊全，因此何樂不為？且不會損傷。[#Legal]
A man doesn't need this to get service, but it goes well with the rest of the outfit; so why not? It can't hurt. [#Legal]
